lore: Marette, the dean of the Magic University of Undolim, researched for decades to find a way to give life to inanimate objects. Her project finally succeeded a few years before the Unification War began.\n\nThe Magi of Undolim gave the Goretongue Gargoyle its name because of its extraordinary ability. This creature has an exceptional control over magic: as long as there is blood on its tongue, it is able to cast spells indefinitely.
menagerieDialog: It is imperative that we always have a backup plan in case our original strategy doesn't work out.
(It's not moving at all. Not one bit, in fact. It's still as stone.)
(This creature could easily be mistaken for a statue.)
name: Goretongue Gargoyle
